summary: "Nier: Automata" is an action role-playing game released in 2017 for PlayStation 4, Windows, and later Xbox One and Nintendo Switch. It's about a war between machines made by aliens and human androids, following characters 2B, 9S, and A2. The story unfolds over multiple playthroughs and combines RPG elements with hack-and-slash combat, plus other video game genres. Developed by PlatinumGames and published by Square Enix, it's a sequel to the "Drakengard" series and "Nier." The game was well-received for its story, themes, and gameplay, though some criticized visual and technical issues. By 2024, it had sold over 8 million copies.
title: Nier Automata
